subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: They are mighty displeased in Boston with John Smoltz. That will happen when you’re 2-5 with an 8.33 earned run average and not nearly yourself after shoulder surgery.
snippet: They are mighty displeased in Boston with John Smoltz. That will happen when you’re 2-5 with an 8.33 earned run average and not nearly yourself after shoulder surgery.
